author: damonc
msg: Added 'add' option to headers command to add a header instead
The cookie command adds a header instead of setting one.  This
allows multiple cookies in a single page.

author: damonc
msg: If the header being set is Set-Cookie, we add it to the table
instead of overwriting it.  This allows us to set more than
one cookie per page, which is legal to all browsers.

author: damonc
msg: Appended packages-local to the auto_path.  This will be a great
place for people to place local packages that we won't mess with.

author: davidw
msg: * tests/apachetest/apachetest.tcl: Added TclX to requirements.  Damn.

author: davidw
msg: Keeping the changelog up to date...
